title: Crusting Buttercream
directions: Mix shortening, liquid, and flavoring first, then add powdered sugar a half a bag at a time. (It helps to warm liquid a bit in microwave)
Add more liquid for thinner Buttercream or more powdered sugar for stiffer icing.
use gel color for best results
Keep at room temperature for several days, refridgerate for several weeks, or frozen several months. Thaw with container covered.
ingredients: 1/3 cup liquid (water, milk, cream, coffee creamer)
